website_summaries.verdict: Toast marshmallows quickly and have all your supplies for s'mores handy with this electric model.
pros: Cooks a marshmallow without a flame
Can cook the marshmallow light or dark, depending on your preference
Has storage bins for s'mores supplies on the edge of the cooker
Great value for an indoor camping experience
cons: The heating grate does get hot and can be hard to clean if the marshmallow sticks to it

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Based on the iffy reviews I was worried it wouldn't work or it would take long. It's perfect for our needs. My 5yo loves this Smores maker and we use it a few times a week now. I plug it in to heat up while I get the ingredients out and connect the trays and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: new mommy

customer_reviews.title: If you have patience....
customer_reviews.text: More kid-friendly than an open flame...but it takes FOREVER to roast the marshmallows, even my niece and nephew could not hold their attention to wait for their marshmallow. It also did not give the same taste as an open flame does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: We have been really enjoy this little s'mores maker it's not big doesn't take up a lot of space but does exactly what it's meant to do. We can't build fires or anything like that around where I live so this was our next best option. it's worked out great for us only thing is it only has two of the little roaster sticks so if you have multiple people roasting you would need something else to use to stick your marshmallow on.
customer_reviews.author: Debb

customer_reviews.title: Fun For All
customer_reviews.text: SO much fun! We've used this a few times now and it is very fun. I do with the sticks were a tad bit longer, I had to get my fondue forks out for my daughter because I didn't want her hands so close to the hot element. We live in an area with wildfires and burning restrictions each summer, so having a fire to roast smores is rare from July 1st onward, this is a great way to have a fun treat and be safe.
customer_reviews.author: G Bean

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for indoor entertainment for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to make s’mores indoors when it’s too cold or wet outside. My son (4) and his Friend loved it. It does take a little time for the marshmallows to melt when I tested it first. I plugged it in a couple of mins before we used it so it was already hot. Then it works better. It’s fun and easy to clean. Can store it easily. The only thing is it comes with two little s’mores skewers. I bought a set from amazon that has adjustable handles. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi R.

customer_reviews.title: No surprise here
customer_reviews.text: SOB! I ordered this as a gift for my son! The same son that found it on my porch, UNPACKAGED !!!!!! He saw what it was, so looks like I'll be returning this! I have NEVER had anything delivered in it's original packaging, always in a brown box!!! It's Christmas time.... Of course 98% of the stuff bought is going to be a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Indoor s'mores!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to gather your family. We are five and were able to roast our marshmallows all at the same time. It did not take a long time. We truly enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: j roldan

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Hahahaha, how cool is this thing. I wasn't sure it was going to work as good as it does, but it works great. Keep an eye on your marshmallow though. And I'd use a real dinner fork. As the mallow heats up that little fork they give you allows it to slide everywhere. Would be very easy to drop a mallow right on the heating element. If you're not at least minimally talented with your hands, and paying 100% attention while using it, your gonna drop one. If that happens the device is burnt toast. Works great if you're careful. I definitely wouldn't let kids under 18 toast their marshmallows though. The device wouldn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: CGG

customer_reviews.title: Fun for family get together
customer_reviews.text: this was a fun gift for my S'mores-loving daughter. Only complaint is that it takes forever to toast a marshmallow! Oh, and be sure not to touch the heating grates with the marshmallow - it's messy and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLovesShoes!

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge smores fan, and in the summer could easily make one every night. This machine makes it so I don't have to make a fire every time, and I don't end up smelling like smoke every day. It does take a few minutes to warm up, but once it gets going this little machine does as it says. Personally, I don't have any use for the four food holders. Also, I believe the whole system it is unsafe to use with little children, as the heater sits on top of the food holders. I would just use the heater, monitor child use, and keep the food holders off to the side for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Manakul

customer_reviews.title: Family love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use just make sure you wait for about 10 minutes so the heat can get really hot. My kids age 6,8 and 14 love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: A. W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! Absolutely love it! Yes it has a smell when you fire it up but it is a new appliance. Probably one of the best things i have bought in awhile! Could be enjoyable for children with supervision. The only thing i wouldnt do is put the chocolate or marshmellows in the trays because the unit dones get really hot so i don't know how well they trays would work.
customer_reviews.author: Paige H

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but it's a bit slow
customer_reviews.text: This is great fun for some indoor s'mores. Only complaint is that it takes a pretty good while to heat up enough to toast a marshmallow (prob in the 10 minute range), and it doesn't get all that hot so it takes another good while to get them soft, but since its slow you do get perfectly done marshmallows. Excited kids can get bored with the wait times since it's not quite as entertaining as a camp fire.
customer_reviews.author: ChunkMaster

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the Nostalgia Electric S’mores makers. I am sadly disappointed. The photo shows the heat unit with the trays around it. However the tray is round with the center cutout is round. The actual burner is square so the trays do not fit around it. The burner is two pieces and the very top part doesn’t stay when trying to roast marshmallows. You can sit the burner on top but again it doesn’t sit steady. So very disappointed in the kit overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done for indoor s’mores. Gets really hot. Using the s’mores-ready square marshmallows and they brown and blacken nicely and evenly so long as you rotate it properly. The storage sides hold an ample amount of each of the ingredients. Compact size makes for easy storage and clean-up. Just wish the power cord was a tad longer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymiss.Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very hot.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this and all the little compartments to hold marshmallows, etc. I gave it to my kid for Xmas. We used it today. It takes a long time to heat up. After 15 minutes it still wasn't hot enough to roast marshmallows. So I let my child roast marshmallows over the electric stove burner. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Cord is a little short
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing me and my daughter love it. It’s easy to use and the instructions are clear. Works perfect for when we need a Smore fix and don’t want to go outside. You do have to plug it in, I don’t know why I thought it was wireless. The cord is a little short but hey we use a cord and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Good for children
customer_reviews.text: Its handy. Small,fits on the counter perfectly. One marshmallow at a time. It does not catch fire. So if you like burnt marshmallow this is not for you. Its difficult to clean if a little one touches a marshmallow to it. It leaves more like a stain mark. The burner part is removable. Takes about 3-5 mins to get the marshmallow soft enough to melt your chocolate. I didnt hate it but I didn't care for it either. I would say Its more children friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Deziree H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Cute little unit for kids. I bought it for my 4 year old. Needs to heat to a higher temp as it takes a bit to get the marshmallow golden brown on the outside. I'd say it takes a good 5+ mins to roast the marshmallow. Uoon first use it took about 5 mins or so for the coil to heat and turn red. Wouldn't be ideal for a large group but works for a few kids that want to make a smore indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Sce

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have three girls that are not, let's say, Outdoorsey. So when we go camping we leave Mom and the Hilton Garden Inn, Dad builds a fire, everyone comes out to do smores, and then Dad sits outside under the stars all alone as everyone else runs to hide from the bugs and icky outdoors things. The indoor smores kit is perfect so we can all stay inside safe from the outdoors, ha!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Anders

customer_reviews.title: It works but its obviously a cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kid brothers for Christmas. The box was literally shipped as the product with a shipping label on it. Thank goodness I didnt need it to be discrete. The product itself is... ok. The product itself is square but the trays that go around the outside are meant to fit around something round. No idea what that's about. It takes a little while to heat up. It will toast the marshmallows, but takes a decent amount of time. It takes quite a few minutes to get to a golden brown.
customer_reviews.author: Hannahkonda

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's super cute and easy to use. Unfortunately it doesn't heat up hot enough to toast the marshmallows. You end up standing there forever to get it slightly yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making memories, making s’mores!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this product! We LOVE roasting marshmallows and this is the perfect tool to do just that on a whim, when it’s raining out and we can’t build a fire, or just any time my 8 year old wants a roasted marshmallow! Fun times are had with this kit! Easy to assemble, fits back in the box, easy to clean, and it gets hot enough to give that brown roasted marshmallow!
customer_reviews.author: KTD

customer_reviews.title: you need the patience of a saint
customer_reviews.text: if you like slow cooking.. and don't mind waiting 5 minutes or more for one s'more - then this is for you!! very small heating surface, and you have to keep it a few centimetres from the heater in order to get any coloring. I cant even imagine any kids using this. turning the stove top on was much more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Skipro56

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!!! And Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this !!! I was able to make 7 s’mores in 20 minutes for my family in our dining room away from the mosquitos outside and the humid Texas weather. This would be awesome for traveling in a camper trailer or RV on rainy or windy nights you could easily Plug this in inside and tell the family to gather around for some s’mores!!!! Must by in my opinion !!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GRANDSON FOR CHRISTMAS AND HE LOVES IT. MY DAUGHTER STATES IT WORKS WELL AND THIS WAS LESS EXPENSIVE THAN IN THE STORES. I WOULD RECOMMED IT.
customer_reviews.author: P O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed being able to make s’mores Sitting around our kitchen table. This uses an electric heating element vs chemical fuel which makes it safer and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD!! Do not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is very dangerous. Any bit of marshmallow that fall on the coil instantly causes a fire. Sending it back for a refund. Didn’t even get one s’mores out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tkarina

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor S'mores
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old niece to do indoor camping with S'mores. The marshmallow had touched the metal frame and left a stain on it. The marshmallow was able to get soft and we were able to make S'mores. It is a great gift for a gift exchange. It is a good gift for young kids to use for indoor camping during these Covid days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This gets used all the time at our house. It was a gift for my 10 year old at Christmas and it has been the most used of her gifts. She loves toasted marshmallows and loves to use it! It doesn't take long to make the marshmallows like I was afraid of. And they taste like normal fire toasted marshmallows!
customer_reviews.author: AAAmom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for campers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister & her family for Xmas -- they camp in the summer, so thought this would be a great gift for both winter & for camping when the weather isn't good for fires. They loved it, unique, good cost. Haven't tested it out personally so can't comment on the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Dtam

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product...return window small
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. Cool concept but it take FOREVER to roast one Marshmello. And I didn’t realize I only had 30 days to return, they really should extend due to this COVID crap and how complicated our world is today. It’s hard to get to a ups store to do a return when you have littles. I wouldn’t recommend this product. And Amazon should be doing more for the return policy. Disappointed all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Femrite

customer_reviews.title: Great for family night
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this smore maker and so does the rest of my family. It heats up quick and we were able to get our marshmallows to a nice golden brown and it doesn't take any longer than roasting a marshmallow on a real fire. This really made our family movie night more fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money- does not work!
customer_reviews.text: We only just tried to use this, and boy am I disappointed that I missed the return window deadline! This item is a big waste of money, very cheap and DOES NOT WORK. Kids tried and tried and tried and couldn’t get marshmallows to brown and got tired of holding them and finally gave up!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cool but could be better!
customer_reviews.text: The units are pretty cute. I purchased for a ladies retreat. They take a very long time to heat up and even at their peak the heat is not as hot as I would like. I takes longer than I would want for the marshmallows to roast. That logo rubs off when you clean the unit which I didn't like. I also think the cord could be a little longer. Overall a decent purchase. It serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnson's

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Instead of having to wait until the weekend. This is so useable during the week and very easy to clean. My daughters have lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo anguiano

customer_reviews.title: DOESN’T WORK
customer_reviews.text: Burner didn’t even get hot. I’m guessing the one we received was defective. Looks like someone returned it and they just sent it right back out to us. I would rather go to dollar tree and buy the canned fires. Waste of time trying to figure out if I was doing something wrong and waste of money because it’s such a hassle to return it. Trust the bad reviews because I gave them the benefit of the doubt. Going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids and adults. Since it is an electric burner, I plan to use it for fondue and not just smores.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but takes too long and doesn’t toast the marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: My kids did not have the patience to wait for it to toast. The kids held it over a long time and it simply didn’t work well at all. Barely warm marshmallows. We ended up using our gas burner on the stove and trashed the s’more maker. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Addicted
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I was unable to put the brown tray on the bottom and when I did, it was unstable. As a result I just use the tray on the side or put my s’mores ingredients on my own plate instead. All of my guests who have tried the machine with me LOVE it. It’s cute, it works, it is perfect! Takes a few minute to heat up then could take a few more minutes to heat up a marshmallow but the waiting period gives time to chat it up with friends. Only issue was that I accidentally had my marshmallow touch the top tray and as a result it’s now stained; I couldn’t wash it off either.
customer_reviews.author: Elle W

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful indoor smore maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and her family. They love making and eating Smores together. It is easy to use and works very well. I love the uniqueness of this item, it made the perfect gift. Now they don't have to wait until summer to make Smores.
customer_reviews.author: Raisin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a white elephant gift and they loved it. We used it immediately and it brought a lot of fun and laughter. It took maybe ~5 minutes for the burner to heat up and it was perfect. I was worried that putting the chocolate in the compartments would make it melt since it’s so close to the burner, but they were completely fine!

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids and I love pulling this out during movie night to create smores. It is easy to use and has been a real treat.
customer_reviews.author: christina owen

customer_reviews.title: S'more indoors
customer_reviews.text: My son like it. ... it's just perfect for us 3. ... It just good for small group or may take turns is okay too. ... It might take awhile to melt. But still it's good. ...it is easy to assemble and wash too. ...
customer_reviews.author: Phia22c

customer_reviews.title: It's not a campfire, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: First, this is a cheap item. You're looking at it because it is inexpensive. No, understand that it takes a while to "toast" each marshmallow. It's fun, it's easy, but it's not just like being at a campfire. With reasonable expectations, this product does just what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hunsinger

customer_reviews.title: Made so many s’mores,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: Was working when I saw one of these for sale on the floor and it made me really miss s’mores but when I finally went to go buy it, they’d taken it off the shelf so I was really glad I found this one. I brought it to college with me and we use it so often. It’s really good at making golden marshmallows and can occasionally burn them but the taste doesn’t really matter when it’s sandwiches between graham crackers and chocolate. You get two stick/fork things but it’s just as easy to use normal forks if you’d like.
customer_reviews.author: Madisen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for the Money?
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well? Not exactly what I hoped for but my grandson loved it so I guess it was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Fun incentive for completion of school work
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it and so did parents. Great incentive as reward for getting school work done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeh.

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the family on Thanksgiving. Made s'mores instead of popcorn on movie nights!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great for tacos!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think it works best with tortillas... Usee Ed the forks to melt the cube cheese and you have an instant meal... The tray is best for sour cream, tomatoes, beans and jalapeños... Viva Mexico!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes no browning just hot metal
customer_reviews.text: Our arms got tired but we timed it at 15 minutes and the marshmallows have a tiny bit of brown on one spot they are cold to touch and not roasted. Super hot metal that falls off when you touch it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: angie las vegas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected, a decent value
customer_reviews.text: Forks are a bit small for grandkids to use. You'll need to really supervise the whole process to avoid and accidents. It does however make very good smores and saves having to alway use the fire pit My only major issue is the trays when assembled form a circle and the unit itself is rectangular so it really doesn't assemble as the photo on the box.
customer_reviews.author: John Porter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product came just as pictured. Very disappointed. I ordered this as a Christmas gift and had to open it and put it in a different package because this one was crap.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Avery

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy making S'mores this is the product for you. It takes about 15 minutes to heat a single marshmallow for a S'more, not enough to melt the chocolate though. If you enjoy eating S'mores use a microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Adlih

customer_reviews.title: Great S’mores Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fun little s’mores maker was a gift for someone who was microwaving marshmallows for s’mores. So glad I purchased it for them! It makes perfect s’mores and is so easy to set up and store!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this it’s so cute I use it when I feel like camping in my living room it’s get hot quickly and if you put your marshmallow against the heater it catches fire and I love it I know I sound crazy but yeah
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: So pleasantly surprised!! I love s’mores and with this is makes it so much easier to make them. You kind of miss the fire smell/taste (or maybe that’s just me) but still works like a charm. Would definitely be a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney R Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Safe and easy to use. Only hiccup is that in the picture, you can use the trays to hold your ingredients. Wouldn't use them for the chocolate because the warm body of the machine will melt the chocolate. Learned that the hard way haha. Still a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for roasting marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: Great product to warm up marshmallows for s’mores didn’t know if it would really work but glad it did
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Llanes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much fun! But tricky for my 8y/o to do his own marshmallows as the heating element takes time to cook them & you have to hold it pretty close. One of the best xmas gifts for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sunga

customer_reviews.title: Roasts a perfect marshmallow indoors!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit for my son's first birthday party a few weeks ago. Being that it was only 30 degrees outside we couldn't roast actual marshmallows at the fire pit so we used this instead. It makes the marshmallow perfectly soft and gooey without burning it! Highly recommend to anyone who likes s'mores.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth M

customer_reviews.title: We loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys on Christmas and we used it today! We all loved it! I don't feel like it took long to heat the marshmallows. Obviously it takes longer than a real fire, but we all loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Ali B

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool when u can’t make campfire s’mores Takes long to roast but still good buy
customer_reviews.author: Dannie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and we wanted to love it but it takes forever to heat up and then it doesn’t get hot enough to toast the marshmallow. It only brings 2 skewers, would’ve been nice at least 4. I personally would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is like the coolest thing ever. I received so any compliments on it. It was easy to use and was great for a quarantine date night.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing the kids love it. Super fun I have a 5 and 7 year old and their 9 year old cousin was over they loved making them more then eating them. Would suggest monitoring with small kids if the marshmallow touches the burner it will set fire quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Johnson

customer_reviews.title: kids have tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Quality family bonding time together is difficult to come by. Not sure how long this gadget will last and how many times we will use it but we surely did have some good laughs and enjoyed a good time together around these chocolates and marshmallows
customer_reviews.author: Xpert

customer_reviews.title: There is no discretion in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: FYI. I got this for a Christmas present and it was delivered in the product box. Kids got home from school first and brought it in off the porch. Merry Christmas, I guess... no surprise there...
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: It does not give the same feeling of a campfire s'mores.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the color of the marshmallow to change like over a campfire. I completely forget that the color change only occur when the sugar caramelize. This is a good product- don't get me wrong. It just like using a portable stove top. It takes about five minutes to heat up which isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pandemic must-have!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to you and actually works well. Can’t wait to keep using it for family nights! It cooked my marshmallows perfectly. Be careful about setting chocolate in the trays though as it might melt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great time with family!
customer_reviews.text: Old fashion family fun! Movie and S’mores in the living room with Mom on a Weekend!! Who would have guessed that’s how to keep teenagers home!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lauzon

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I was hoping it would be! Easy setup worked great! Perfect for my son with Asthma no harsh smells or fumes. this is going to be perfect for a snowy day! BUY IT CANT GO WRONG!
customer_reviews.author: 💞Suzanne💞

customer_reviews.title: Great for all s’mores lovers.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My daughter loves s’mores and this makes it so easy for her to have a treat. The unit is easy to clean, heats well and makes great s’mores.
customer_reviews.author: patsy71

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old nephew and he loves it-as does his whole family! He said it cooks the marshmallows quickly, East to use, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mikulak

customer_reviews.title: who can resist smores.
customer_reviews.text: this is a xmas present. She wants to make some winter smores. Looks like a great product and it has the 4 compartments that she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: ssmey

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and nostalgic. Would've love for the burning part to be a little bigger. It's a bit small. Otherwise great for a quick s'more satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Cheal

customer_reviews.title: S’mores in no time. Such fun!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love ours!!! Would gift it as well. Some reviews claim it does not get hit enough or takes a long time to toast the marshmallows. Couldn’t be farther from the truth from our experience. A+
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Good for entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun to use. It heated up the marshmallow in a reg. Average time. Easy clean up. We use it for get together dessert fun!
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Fun product. It shipped with the label attached to the product not in another box so the box was banged up. Everything in it was still okay. Good value for a fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reyes

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving this thing ANY stars is because there’s not a zero star option. It never worked. Then, when it came, they slapped a label on the product box and I needed a box to mail the faulty crap back in and ended up just throwing it out. Waste.
customer_reviews.author: HunnyB

customer_reviews.title: S'more fun ; )
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great gift for any family or child. I wish we had this when my kids were younger. Now I am a Noni and a Aunty so this will defintely be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Cute but inefficient
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Bought it as a housewarming gift. The major downside is that it takes forever to actually toast a marshmallow. We ended up just roasting them over the stove instead. Cute idea, bad execution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indoor S’mores
customer_reviews.text: The actual product doesn’t look like the images on Amazon. It is made of cheap plastic and low quality material. But it works as advertised and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: iTechPro

customer_reviews.title: SMOKE
customer_reviews.text: The product smoked so much it set the fire alarm off. I only had it plugged in for a few seconds before smoke came off of it. I bought it for my elementary school classroom and I am so glad I tried it BEFORE bringing it to school! The product is completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works very slowly
customer_reviews.text: It worked but it was a long time getting even a lil browness on the marshmallow. Prob a safety feature since it is for indoor use but frankly my kids were tired of waiting on the marshmallow. Also because it browned so little it really didn’t hardly melt the chocolate bar that much.
customer_reviews.author: Playtoy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for what it is. Takes a while to cook the mellows...but I mean you are making smores inside. So its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kdr1123

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. Does not work. Did not get hot enough to even come close to toasting one enough to make a smores.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to cook the mallows, the coils dont get as hot or put off as much of a flame for them to get toasty quickly, but it works great for a fun do it yourself dessert while conversing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: britters

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so. Marshmallow fireside in seconds LOL highly recommend. The trays come apart for cleaning and snaps back easily
customer_reviews.author: LaQua Burney

customer_reviews.title: They taste real good when they are done
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would have made the grate twice the size it is, it is too small and it takes quite a while to roast your marshmallows, even after letting it warm up. Also, the electric cord needs to be longer so it can sit in the middle of your table. We have to plug it in on a side table or counter and stand there till done! They taste real good when they are done, but I am still disappointed; however my kids think it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: marsha young

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for friends. They were happy to receive it but I can not attest to how well it functions, easy of use or cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties easy to use clean and store
customer_reviews.text: We have used this s’mores maker countless times at small parties even big family gathering and it is always a hit the trays are nice to help keep item organized and clean top cover guard comes out for easy cleaning and eye gets very hot so use with caution and turn off when not using
customer_reviews.author: Jered

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job of roasting the marshmallows. Easy to clean and use. We've used it a fair amount this summer.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on a whim and we love it! Toasts the marshmallows perfectly and the trays around the base make it so easy to assembly your smore. Definitely a hit with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Worst smore machine ever
customer_reviews.text: It went on fire and we were so scared and my mother wasn’t home And it was only on for a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for the making s'mores. Light weight, fits all the pieces, and fun to use. a great find for fun
customer_reviews.author: Debby Weitzberg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Fun and nice option but takes forever to brown a marshmallow. You can only do one at a time too so very slow process. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. Smaller than I envisioned from the picture, and it takes a bit for the marshmallow to heat up enough to be able to put it onto your graham cracker.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lester

customer_reviews.title: Slow to heat but fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to heat up. When it does heat up, it’s very weak and doesn’t roast the Marshmello very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor s'mores
customer_reviews.text: Hey! 5 stars! Delicious! I live in an apartment and my pregnant sister in a townhome, neither with a yard to host a fire. This really got my poor pregnant sisters craving for a summer time s’more! 10/10 would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: La_Chupacabraj

product_meta.title: Nostalgia Indoor Electric Stainless Steel S'mores Maker with 4 Compartment Trays for Graham Crackers, Chocolate, Marshmallows and 2 Roasting Forks, Brown
product_meta.description: Style Name:S'mores MakerSkip the hassle of building a bonfire and bring the taste of the campfire right into the kitchen! Simply fill the compartment tray with marshmallows, chocolate and graham crackers, then roast the marshmallows to a perfect golden brown over the flameless electric heater and enjoy.
feature_bullets: Outdoor fun brought indoors: Bring s'more fun indoors and roast marshmallows to perfection over the tabletop electric flameless heater

Electric flameless heater: forget the hassle of cutting wood and open flames, this unit is built with safety in mind; the electric flameless heater requires nothing but an electrical outlet to start making perfect golden brown s'mores
Roasting forks: includes 2 stainless steel roasting forks to make s'mores with friends and keep hands a safe distance from the heater. Never use abrasive cleaners on the unit
Durable & easy clean: durable stainless steel base with easy to disassemble trays makes this an easy to clean s'mores maker. Bpa free
Make it a party: make any event worth celebrating; easily set up a s'mores station during parties, family gatherings and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,001 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
